text: yeah I mean I I always loved musicals
just as a genre and just there was
something it was funny I used to hate
musicals as a kid and for that very very
same reason I hated them as a kid I
started to love them later I was all
about that transition from just kind of
real life to people suddenly breaking
into song which is so kind of
simultaneously you know off-putting at
times but also wonderful so I wanted to
make a movie with the means that I had
which were very limited means but but
really about that transition from real
life to musical number and back again so
so the idea was just do a musical but
set it in the world I knew which was
Boston and sort of people my age in
Boston and kind of incorporate their own
lives into it and shoot it kind of like
a documentary and just you know
wait the way I'd been used to shooting
movies and just do a musical and a sort
of homegrown fashion the way I would do
it
